entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
